DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study test reliability validity Turkish Feeding/Swallowing Impact Survey among caregiver pediatric patient swallow disorder .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study test reliability validity Turkish Feeding/Swallowing Impact Survey among caregiver pediatric patient swallow disorders.The internal consistency , test-retest reliability , criterion validity T-EAT-10 investigate . The internal consistency assess use Cronbach 's alpha . Intraclass correlation coefficient ( ICC ) value 95 % confidence interval calculate test-retest reliability . The criterion validity scale determine assess correlation Turkish Feeding/Swallowing Impact Survey Karaduman Chewing Performance Scale , Tongue Thrust Rating Scale , Pediatric version Eating Assessment Tool . The validity also determine completion Turkish Feeding/Swallowing Impact Survey swallow rehabilitation pediatric patient .
DOC.criteria: Having child swallow disorder age 6 months18 year Having child without swallow disorder Having child swallow disorder age 6 month
